freenet.crypt
Class SHA1

java.lang.Object
  freenet.crypt.SHA1
All Implemented Interfaces:
Digest
public final class SHA1
extends Object
implements Digest

This is a simple port of Steve Reid's SHA-1 code into Java. I've run his test vectors through the code and they all pass.
